meanings.sent1: After the ceremony, they will reanoint the king for good luck.
meanings.sent2: She will reanoint the door with oil to prevent squeaking.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to reanoint the salad with a fresh dressing.
meanings.sent4: The gardener reanointed the plants with fertilizer to help them grow.
meanings.sent5: The priest will reanoint the holy relics during the annual ritual.

meanings.definition: The act of applying oil or ointment again.
meanings.sent1: The reanointing of the athlete's muscles helped soothe the pain.
meanings.sent2: She performed a reanointing on her dry skin to keep it moisturized.
meanings.sent3: The reanointing of the car engine made it run smoothly again.
meanings.sent4: The reanointing of the hinges stopped the door from creaking.
meanings.sent5: The reanointing of the leather shoes restored their shine.

meanings.definition: The process of reapplying a sacred or ceremonial substance.
meanings.sent1: The reanointing of the altar was a solemn and important task.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, the priest performed the reanointing of the sacred vessel.
meanings.sent3: The reanointing of the ancient artifact brought good fortune to the village.
meanings.sent4: The reanointing of the ceremonial sword signified the beginning of the ritual.
meanings.sent5: The reanointing of the holy relics was believed to cleanse them of impurities.
